# Data Source: okta_campaign

Get the campaign belonging to an Okta organization.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "okta_campaign" "test" {
  id = "<campaign id>"
}
```

## Schema

### Read-Only
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
